column2: the food was pretty darn good over all. It was probably a lot more than we thought we could eat
column3: but the sauce was mainly the best part. It was spicy and juicy and its making me drool right now. The sausage
column5: brisket and shredded meat was really good. Those were probably my favorite with the least favorite being the ribs. (This is because I don't really like charring on my meat too much.) We also got lots of sauce to go along with all the meat
